Judul: Ef fect of visual communication in tracking activity schedule  among children with autism spectrum disorder
Abstrak:
The purpose of this study was to effect of visual communication in tracking activity schedule among 
children with autism spectrum disorder. The data was collected on 5 children with autism spectrum 
disorder studying at Sanjivini Health Care Centre (School for Autism), Coimbatore (06 to 12 years) 
was selected. The checklists developed by the authors were given to the experts in the field of special 
education for their opinion and suggestions. The result shows that after 15 sessions of visual 
communication activity schedule intervention, there is significant difference between using visual 
communication improving activity schedule and behavior & communication of children with autism 
spectrum disorder. That mean visual schedules are promoting independent functioning of children 
with autism and increasing on task behavior
Kata Kunci: visual communication, autism spectrum disorder , children
Sumber: Indian Journal of Health and  W ell - being  2018, 9(5), 748-751
